mapper.select: /* cmpny.CmpnyUserMapper.getCmpnyUserList */ SELECT CU.CMPNY_USER_ID , CU.USER_TYPE_CD, CU.CMPNY_ID , C.CMPNY_TYPE_CD, C.CMPNY_NM , CU.USER_NM, CU.LOGIN_ID , CU.STAT_CD, CU.JOIN_DT , CU.DEPT_NM, CU.POSI_NM , CU.TEL_NO, CU.FAX_NO, CU.HP_NO, CU.EMAIL , CU.REG_DTS, CU.REGPE_ID , CU.MOD_DTS, CU.MODPE_ID FROM CMPNY_USER CU LEFT OUTER JOIN CMPNY C ON CU.CMPNY_ID = C.CMPNY_ID WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY CU.CMPNY_ID, CU.USER_TYPE_CD , CU.CMPNY_USER_ID

/* cmpny.CmpnyUserMapper.getCmpnyUser */ SELECT CU.CMPNY_USER_ID , CU.USER_TYPE_CD, CU.CMPNY_ID , C.CMPNY_TYPE_CD, C.CMPNY_NM , CU.USER_NM, CU.LOGIN_ID, CU.PWD , CU.STAT_CD, CU.JOIN_DT , CU.DEPT_NM, CU.POSI_NM , CU.TEL_NO, CU.FAX_NO, CU.HP_NO, CU.EMAIL , CU.REG_DTS, CU.REGPE_ID , CU.MOD_DTS, CU.MODPE_ID FROM CMPNY_USER CU LEFT OUTER JOIN CMPNY C ON CU.CMPNY_ID = C.CMPNY_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND CU.LOGIN_ID = #{loginId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

/* cmpny.CmpnyUserMapper.getCmpnyUserSiteList */ SELECT CUS.CMPNY_USER_ID , CUS.WORK_SITE_ID, WS.SITE_NM , CUS.POSI_NM , CUS.USE_YN FROM CMPNY_USER CU , WORK_SITE WS , CMPNY_USER_SITE CUS WHERE 1 = 1 AND CU.CMPNY_USER_ID = #{cmpnyUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CU.CMPNY_ID = WS.CMPNY_ID AND CU.CMPNY_USER_ID = CUS.CMPNY_USER_ID AND CUS.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CUS.WORK_SITE_ID = WS.WORK_SITE_ID
